resources.string: A dog knows that two bones are better than one, a goldfish that there are more food flakes in this pinch than that…\'40 Matches In A Box\' is a game designed to help us aspire to such insight.

The inspiration came when watching the classic film \'Rainman\' (starring Tom Cruise and Dustin Hoffman (featured)). Why can the chap with high functioning Asperger\'s syndrome count so incredibly quickly? I wonder if it is possible to learn to do so.
The results of preliminary trials remain inconclusive, though trial candidates have shown a marked increase in head size and have become more attractive to the opposite sex.
